comments.author: EnvironmentalSense14
comments.body:
Urgent Vietnam eVisa question - Please help


Hi there!

I am planning on visiting Vietnam towards the end of this month. I come from a country that requires a visa to visit Vietnam. I had applied for the eVisa a few weeks ago.

They returned my application last week saying that it needs to be amended, for the following reason: “Please provide information of the tourist company in vietnam”.

That checkbox was an optional one which I had previously checked as no: “Agency/Organization/Individual that the applicant plans to contact when enter into Viet Nam?”.

After they returned it back for amendment, I checked that checkbox and added the details of a company that I MIGHT contact once I am there (they ask for the Name, Address, Phone Number, and Purpose - I added “Tourism tours and cruises” as a Purpose), then I submitted it.

Today, they sent my Visa application AGAIN for amendment, for the very same reason: “Please provide information of the tourist company in vietnam”. 

Does anyone have any tips or first hand experience with this? I am afraid of submitting it again as is and end up getting denied the visa. I am travelling in a few days and this has already taken a few weeks now.

I would greatly appreciate any advice, thanks in advance! :)
